comments.body: Consider validating or handling non-numeric characters before parsing buffer to double to prevent exceptions.
Division by zero will lead to an exception. Consider adding a check to safely handle this case.
Property change notification can be improved by using the [CallerMemberName] attribute to simplify the OnPropertyChanged call.
RelayCommand is used without showing its definition or implementation. Consider including it in the code if custom or referencing where it's implemented.
Setup could be streamlined by using setup initializer rather than creating the calculator instance in each test.
Test is missing boundary cases, such as negative numbers and zero division. Consider adding more test cases for comprehensive test coverage.
